resources/ATOMIC-ENGAGE-PROMPT.md - COMPLETE EXECUTION PROTOCOL FOR FEATURE CARDS

STRATEGY.tone: Fashion Insider - Cognitive Disruption, NOT tech specs

requirements.images: TESTIMONIAL images only (social proof) - NOT product shots

OBJECTION_MAPPING.CRITICAL: Each Micro Feature SUBTLY addresses an objection type

feature_1.objection: VEHICLE - Why other products' mechanisms fail
feature_1.example_truth: That $50 jacket? Its zipper will catch and stick within a month.
feature_1.example_benefit: Ours uses YKK hardware that glides for years.

feature_2.objection: INTERNAL - Why it'll work for HER body
feature_2.example_truth: Length isn't modesty; cut is modesty.
feature_2.example_benefit: Our curved rise covers you without looking boxy.

feature_3.example_truth: Decorative pockets are fashion's laziest trick.
feature_3.example_benefit: Real pockets that actually fit your phone.

feature_4.objection: VEHICLE - Another mechanism that usually fails
feature_4.example_truth: Tight sleeves aren't 'fitted' - they're poorly drafted.
feature_4.example_benefit: Our sleeve allows full movement without bulk.

JSON_THINKING_REQUIREMENT.CRITICAL: Draft each card in JSON FIRST to ensure all 5 elements exist
JSON_THINKING_REQUIREMENT.output_format: Combine JSON into natural flowing paragraph as MULTIROW_PARAGRAPH_X

ENGAGE_5_ELEMENT_FORMULA.CRITICAL: ALL 4 feature cards MUST use the first 5 elements of ENGAGE
ENGAGE_5_ELEMENT_FORMULA.total_words: ~40 words per card (bold headline + 3-5 sentence paragraph)

1_EXPLOIT_COGNITIVE_DISRUPTION.format: Bold headline that challenges a common belief
1_EXPLOIT_COGNITIVE_DISRUPTION.rule: Challenge what they think they know about this feature

2_NARRATE_UNFINISHED_STORY.format: Introduce a relatable realization or moment of discovery
examples: You bought that $60 jacket thinking it was quality.
You've felt it - that awkward moment when you sit and the rise gaps.
You reach for your phone and realize: decorative pockets again.
2_NARRATE_UNFINISHED_STORY.rule: Create a 'you've been here' moment that's unresolved

3_GIVE_CONTROVERSIAL_TRUTH.format: State an uncomfortable truth about typical clothing
examples: Hardware quality is where fast fashion cuts corners first.
Length isn't modesty; cut is modesty.
Fake pockets are fashion's laziest trick.
3_GIVE_CONTROVERSIAL_TRUTH.rule: Say the quiet part out loud - the industry secret

examples: You don't want to look cheap - but cheap zippers give you away.
You want coverage without looking frumpy.
Carrying a bag for your phone defeats the point of a pocket.
4_ATTACH_HIGH_STAKES_CONFLICT.rule: Connect to identity, confidence, or self-image stakes

5_GUARANTEE_UNCONVENTIONAL_PAYOFF.format: Explain how this feature solves it in a surprising, low-effort way
examples: Our YKK hardware glides for years - no catches, no cheap feel.
Our curved rise covers you without adding bulk.
Real pockets that fit your phone and keys - finally.
5_GUARANTEE_UNCONVENTIONAL_PAYOFF.rule: The solution should feel effortless/obvious once revealed

ENGAGE_5_ELEMENT_FORMULA.REQUIRED_TONE: Confident, empathetic, precise. Gen Z women. Fashion insider.

images.CRITICAL: MUST be testimonial/social proof images - NOT product shots
images.WHY: Social proof images show REAL women wearing it, building trust while explaining specs

Does each paragraph include a 'you've been here' moment?
